newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Metro Pacific sets 30 pct stock dividend.
newsitem.headline: Metro Pacific sets 30 pct stock dividend.

text.p: Diversified firm Metro Pacific Corp said on Monday its board had approved a 30 percent stock dividend.
Details of the dividend have yet to be finalised since it still needs the approval of the Securities and Exchange Commission and the ratification of shareholders.
Metro Pacific, the flagship company of First Pacific Co Ltd in the Philippines, is involved in banking, telecommunications, consumer products, property and packaging.
"The stock dividend is part of the company's continued commitment to strengthen and broaden its capital base and to position itself for future growth," the company said in a statement.
